languages.text: "Авгуры не засекли признаков жизни на станции, а это значит, очередная сделка еще не началась, и у нас будет время подготовиться к приему гостей". {n}Последние слова служитель Инквизиции произносит особенно мрачно.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Авгуры не засекли признаков жизни на станции, а это значит, очередная сделка еще не началась, и у нас будет время подготовиться к приему гостей". {n}Последние слова служитель Инквизиции произносит особенно мрачно.{/n}
traits.speaker: AhileasSkalandr

languages.text: "The augurs detect no vital signs on the station, which means the next deal has not been negotiated yet. We still have the time to prepare a proper welcome." {n}The servant of the Inquisition gloomily releases the final few words.{/n}

traits.speaker: AhileasSkalandr

traits.locale_text: "The augurs detect no vital signs on the station, which means the next deal has not been negotiated yet. We still have the time to prepare a proper welcome." {n}The servant of the Inquisition gloomily releases the final few words.{/n}
traits.speaker: AhileasSkalandr

languages.text: « Les augures ne détectent aucun signe de vie dans la station, ce qui signifie que la prochaine transaction n'a pas encore été négociée. Nous aurons tout le loisir de préparer le comité d'accueil. » {n}Le serviteur de l'Inquisition profère ces derniers mots comme une sentence glaciale.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The augurs detect no vital signs on the station, which means the next deal has not been negotiated yet. We still have the time to prepare a proper welcome." {n}The servant of the Inquisition gloomily releases the final few words.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Les augures ne détectent aucun signe de vie dans la station, ce qui signifie que la prochaine transaction n'a pas encore été négociée. Nous aurons tout le loisir de préparer le comité d'accueil. » {n}Le serviteur de l'Inquisition profère ces derniers mots comme une sentence glaciale.{/n}
traits.speaker: AhileasSkalandr

languages.text: “俄歇矩阵探测结果显示，星站内没有任何生命体征。这意味着下一场交易还没有谈妥，我们还有时间准备一场盛大的欢迎仪式。”{n}审判庭的仆从阴沉着脸，说出了最后几个字。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The augurs detect no vital signs on the station, which means the next deal has not been negotiated yet. We still have the time to prepare a proper welcome." {n}The servant of the Inquisition gloomily releases the final few words.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “俄歇矩阵探测结果显示，星站内没有任何生命体征。这意味着下一场交易还没有谈妥，我们还有时间准备一场盛大的欢迎仪式。”{n}审判庭的仆从阴沉着脸，说出了最后几个字。{/n}
traits.speaker: AhileasSkalandr

languages.text: "Die Auguren können auf der Station keine Lebenszeichen erkennen. Der nächste Deal wurde also wohl noch nicht ausgehandelt. Wir haben noch genügend Zeit, um eine angemessene Begrüßung zu organisieren." {n}Die letzten paar Wörter spricht der Diener der Inquisition mit düsterer Stimme.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The augurs detect no vital signs on the station, which means the next deal has not been negotiated yet. We still have the time to prepare a proper welcome." {n}The servant of the Inquisition gloomily releases the final few words.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Die Auguren können auf der Station keine Lebenszeichen erkennen. Der nächste Deal wurde also wohl noch nicht ausgehandelt. Wir haben noch genügend Zeit, um eine angemessene Begrüßung zu organisieren." {n}Die letzten paar Wörter spricht der Diener der Inquisition mit düsterer Stimme.{/n}
traits.speaker: AhileasSkalandr

languages.text: «Los augures no han detectado ninguna señal vital en la estación, por lo que deducimos que todavía no han negociado el siguiente trato. Eso nos da tiempo para preparar un buen recibimiento». {n}El sirviente de la Inquisición pronuncia las últimas palabras con un tono sombrío.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The augurs detect no vital signs on the station, which means the next deal has not been negotiated yet. We still have the time to prepare a proper welcome." {n}The servant of the Inquisition gloomily releases the final few words.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Los augures no han detectado ninguna señal vital en la estación, por lo que deducimos que todavía no han negociado el siguiente trato. Eso nos da tiempo para preparar un buen recibimiento». {n}El sirviente de la Inquisición pronuncia las últimas palabras con un tono sombrío.{/n}
traits.speaker: AhileasSkalandr

languages.text: 「スキャナーは、ステーションに生命反応を検出していない。つまり、次の取引はまだ取り決められていないということだ。きちんとした歓迎の準備をする時間は、まだあるな」{n}異端審問庁の使いは、暗い表情で最後の言葉を吐き捨てた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The augurs detect no vital signs on the station, which means the next deal has not been negotiated yet. We still have the time to prepare a proper welcome." {n}The servant of the Inquisition gloomily releases the final few words.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「スキャナーは、ステーションに生命反応を検出していない。つまり、次の取引はまだ取り決められていないということだ。きちんとした歓迎の準備をする時間は、まだあるな」{n}異端審問庁の使いは、暗い表情で最後の言葉を吐き捨てた。{/n}
traits.speaker: AhileasSkalandr

languages.text: "Alametlere göre istasyonda yaşam belirtisi bulunmuyor. Yani bir sonraki anlaşma henüz gerçekleşmemiş. Yaraşır bir karşılama hazırlamak için hâlâ vakit var." {n}Engizisyon hizmetkârı, sözlerini kasvetle noktalıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The augurs detect no vital signs on the station, which means the next deal has not been negotiated yet. We still have the time to prepare a proper welcome." {n}The servant of the Inquisition gloomily releases the final few words.{/n}
